short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggests search within an amount of search engines. To use, type '»' plus a search term into the Omnibox.
short.ru: Добавляет в Omnibox возможность искать в разных поисковых системах, сразу искать картинки, переводить.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick access to different useful options (like search agains Wikipedia, translation within Lingvo service etc.) via Chrome Omnibox.

One simply types in the address field » sign, followed by space and term definition and the engine will let choose one of five variants of what to do with that term.

Adopted to be used within ru_RU environment.
